buyTokens(address).details: low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***

claimRefund().details: Investors can claim refunds here if crowdsale is unsuccessful

finalize().details: Must be called after crowdsale ends, to do some extra finalization work. Calls the contract's finalization function.

goalReached().details: Checks whether funding goal was reached.

hasClosed().details: Checks whether the period in which the crowdsale is open has already elapsed.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.
